item.title: Those Win9x Crashes on Fast Machines‚Ä¶
item.description: It is well known that Win9x variants prior to Windows 98 have a tendency to crash on fast CPUs. The definition of ‚Äúfast‚Äù is of course fuzzy but the problems were known to occur on AMD K6-2 processors running at 350 MHz or faster as early as 1998. This led to some acrimony when Microsoft attempted to charge $35 for the fix. The crashes were intermittent on the 350 MHz parts but harder to avoid with faster clock speeds.
item.author: (Posted on)

item.title: Haveibeenpwned.com pwned our helpdesk! GLPI 9.4.5 SQL Injection ‚Äì fyr.io
item.description: On GLPI 9.4.5, creating a call (via the standard interface or email, etc) that contains the basic SQL injection string ';-- " will be logged normally with no abnormal behaviour, however if a Technician assigns themselves to that call via the quick ‚ÄúAssign to me‚Äù button, the SQL query will be executed. In the case of the example string given above, all existing calls, open or closed, will be updated to have their descriptions deleted and replaced with any text that appears before the aforementioned malicious string. You can of course modify this to perform other SQL queries.

item.title: Declining worker power versus rising monopoly power
item.description: Since the early 1980s, the US has seen a falling labour share and slow wage growth for typical workers, while¬†measures of corporate valuations and measured markups have increased.¬†A number of papers have argued that increasing monopoly or monopsony power can explain these trends. This column argues instead that the decline in worker power in the US economy is a more compelling

item.title: Software Engineering Within SpaceX - Yasoob Khalid
item.description: Hi everyone! üëã I am sure quite a few of you must have seen the SpaceX launch this past Saturday. It was an amazing and historic event. Millions of people were watching it live on YouTube and elsewhere. With each passing day, we are getting closer to commercial space flights and I have to agree I am excited. In addition to fueling my excitement about space travel, this launch also made me curious about the tech which goes in these rockets.
item.author: (Muhammad Yasoob Ullah Khalid)
